mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coinmap(cmc_rank,symbol, name, id, last_updated, percent_change_24h, market_cap) VALUES(#{cmc_rank}, #{symbol}, #{name},#{id}, #{last_updated}, #{percent_change_24h}, #{market_cap})
mapper.update: update coinmap set cmc_rank = #{cmc_rank}, symbol = #{symbol}, name = #{name}, id = #{id}, last_updated = #{last_updated}, percent_change_24h = #{percent_change_24h}, market_cap = #{market_cap}, where cmc_rank = #{cmc_rank}
